featureList.description: After submission, queries the database by Name/DOB to identify a patient as 'New' or 'Returning'.

featureList.name: ğŸ§  Smart Scheduling
featureList.description: Automatically allocates 60-minute slots for new patients and 30-minute slots for returning patients.

featureList.name: ğŸ“… Calendly Integration
featureList.description: Uses the Calendly API to fetch and display available slots based on the required duration (30/60 min) and books the selected slot.

featureList.description: After booking, displays a digital replica of the `New Patient Intake Form.pdf` for completion.
